content: Note that if the model is intended to contain a large amount of vertices (whether these are all added to the geometry at creation time or afterwards), an error will occur if that number exceeds 65535. This is because the index type of a GeomPrimitive is set to GeomEnums.NT_uint16 by default. To prevent this, set the index type to GeomEnums.NT_uint32 and cast values to the 'I' format:
